messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
I got a report of a shooting.
Okay, where?
Lehigh Hanson Permanente, 24001 Stevens Creek Boulevard.
Okay, and where are you on the premises?
I'm in a control room.
Okay, but where's the patient?
There are multiple shooting victims in the quarry. It just happened.
Multiple victims? Where exactly in the quarry?
The quarry's in the back of the plant facility. The sheriffs will need to go all the way to the back behind the cement plant.
Do we know how many victims?
No, I don't.
What's the phone number you're calling from?
I'm calling from the plant phone. The number's generated by the computer system.
Can you confirm the number?
It's a company phone, but I'm in the control room.
Okay. Tell me exactly what happened.
I got a call from a guy just screaming on the phone. There are people shot in the quarry.
Okay, and nobody's answering you on the radio?
No one's answering. We're trying another phone line right now.
So you're not with the patients, correct?
No. We're trying to call the phones up there and other numbers.
Since you don't have much information, can you find out how many victims there are? We're sending fire and ambulance.
Okay.
When you find out, can you please call us back?
Yes.
9-1-1, what's your emergency?
We need help. We need the police here.
Okay, what's the address of the emergency?
Steven Creek Boulevard at the cement plant and the quarry. Somebody's shooting everybody.
How many people?
A lot, around six people shot. Please, we need help.
Okay, let me get everyone started. Hold on one second.
Please, we need help.
Okay, everybody's on the way. Hold on one second for me, okay?
Please help, people are going to die.
Okay, hold on so I can get everyone started. They're on the way, but stay on the phone.
Thank you.
Who's doing the shooting? Do you know who it is?
It's an African American guy.
Do you know who it is?
He used to work here. I think it's Sharif Elman.
Do you know if he left?
He drove off in a brown cougar, like a 96 or 95 model.
Do you know which way he went from the quarry?
The only way out is through the gate. I don't know which way he turned.
Do you know how many people are hurt?
I think around five or six people.
Stay on the line with me. We already have help started, okay?
Thank you.
Are you shot sir?
No.
Can you tell me the phone number you're calling from?
It's...
Can you go check on the injured and come back?
Okay, I'll be right back.
Can you see any of the people who are hurt?
I saw about three or four.
Can you tell me exactly what happened?
A guy came late to work, got a cup of coffee, then came back with a rifle and a handgun and started shooting.
How many shots did you hear?
About 20 to 30 shots.
We need to try to help those who are injured. Do you have clean cloths or towels?
Yes, I have some.
Get them and come right back.
Okay, I've got them.
Press the clean cloth firmly on the wounds. Do not lift it up to look. Can you do that?
Yes, I'm doing it. There are about five people.
Focus on the person next to you. Are they severely injured?
Yes, they're bleeding badly.
Just press down firmly and don't lift the cloth. Help is on the way.
Thank you.
Stay with me. Where exactly are you in the facility?
In the office area up in the quarry.
Can you describe other people there?
There's blood everywhere, and some people are dying.
I understand. We're doing everything we can to get help there fast.
One guy came in and said someone has already died.
Sheriff's Office, 9-1-1. What's your emergency?
I was driving to work, and I saw a lady lying on the ground with a man leaning over her.
Where are you at?
I'm in the parking lot of HP.
HP call? Let me look. Are you afraid for the woman's safety?
Yes, I'm safe, but my car got shot. The man saw my license plate.
Did you see what the man looked like?
He was kind of fat, about 250 to 300 pounds, looked Hispanic.
What's the address there?
10955 North Tantow Avenue. It's inside the HP parking lot.
Was the lady conscious?
I don't think so. She wasn't resisting.
Was the man trying to take something from her?
I think so, maybe her purse.
What's your name and phone number?
[User gives name and phone number]
Stay inside, contact security, and lock the doors. Help is on the way.
Yes, thank you.
